mods.abstract: Page 86 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 [132] shows a canal for possible rice irrigation narrowing through expansive fields with no trees.; Photograph 2 [133] shows a canal for possible rice irrigation narrowing through expansive fields with no trees.; Photograph 3 [134] shows rice bundles stacked in a field. Thresher, rice straw pile and buildings shown in the distance.
mods.note: Compare Photographs 1-3 to the following publication. Stubbs, W.C. (1900) Rice. Louisiana Bulletin, No. 61, pp. 371-436.
